supportedUseCase: Shows Okta users by current status, inactive users, and deprovisioned/inactive users with access to other accounts.

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find okta_user as o 
return o.status as name, count(o) as value

widgets.title: Okta Users Inactive For More Than 90 Days

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find okta_user with lastLoginOn < date.now-90 days and status != "DEPROVISIONED"  as u
return
count(u) as value

widgets.title: Okta Users Inactive for more than 90 days

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find okta_user with lastLoginOn < date.now-90 days and status != "DEPROVISIONED" as o

RETURN o.displayName as email, o.name as name, o.status as status

widgets.title: OKTA DEPROVISIONED OR Inactive Users with Access to User account

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find okta_user with ( lastLoginOn < date.now-90 days OR status="DEPROVISIONED") and lastName!~="Agent" as o that is Person that is User with active=true as u 
RETURN count(o) as value

widgets.title: OKTA DEPROVISIONED OR Inactive Users with Access to User account

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find okta_user with ( lastLoginOn < date.now-90 days OR status="DEPROVISIONED") and lastName!~="Agent" as o that is Person that is User with active=true as u
RETURN o.name as Name, u._type as Account, u.username as Username

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find okta_user with createdOn > date.now - 1 month as o (That (HAS|ASSIGNED) (mfa_device) as p )? 
return o.displayName as id, 
o.organization as "OrgAssigned",
o.employeeNumber as EmployeeNumber,
o.jobTitle as "JobTitle",
o.manager as "Manager",
p.displayName as "MFADevice"

queries.name: query2
